org.springframework.data.rest.core.mapping

接口 ResourceMapping

  • 所有已知子接口:
    CollectionResourceMapping, MethodResourceMapping, ResourceMetadata
    所有已知实现类:
    SearchResourceMappings

    public interface ResourceMapping
    Mapping information for components to be exported as REST resources.
    作者:
    Oliver Gierke

    • 方法概要

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Path getPath()
      Returns the path the resource is exposed under.
      String getRel()
      Returns the relation for the resource exported.
      Boolean isExported()
      Returns whether the component shall be exported at all.

    • 方法详细资料

      • isExported

        Boolean isExported()
        Returns whether the component shall be exported at all.
        返回:
        will never be null.

      • getRel

        String getRel()
        Returns the relation for the resource exported.
        返回:
        will never be null.

      • getPath

        Path getPath()
        Returns the path the resource is exposed under.
        返回:
        will never be null.
